https://9to5mac.com/2021/04/23/psa-new-12-9-inch-ipad-pro-isnt-compatible-with-the-older-magic-keyboard/

While the 2021 12.9-inch iPad Pro is broadly similar to the 2018 and 2020 models, the new tablet stands out on one point: itâ€™s thicker, at precisely 0.5mm. It might not sound like much, but itâ€™s enough for Apple to adjust its Magic Keyboard, the iPad Proâ€™s dedicated trackpad keyboard. And according to the documentation provided to the Apple Stores that we have been able to consult, the old Magic Keyboard is not compatible with the large iPad Pros of 2021.
